Battle Damaged Sci-fi Helmet - PBR by [theblueturtle_](https://sketchfab.com/theblueturtle_), published under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial license https://sketchfab.com/models/b81008d513954189a063ff901f7abfe4 ## Modifications The original model was built on an early draft of glTF 2.0 that did not become final.  This new model has been imported and re-exported from Blender to bring it into alignment with the final release glTF 2.0 specification.

The two meshes in this model (the dragon, and the cloth backdrop) are from different sources and have different licenses applied. ### Dragon The dragon model based on the one from [Morgan McGuire's Computer Graphics Archive](https://casual-effects.com/data).   Original dragon mesh data based on a [Stanford Scan](http://www.graphics.stanford.edu/data/3Dscanrep/) © 1996 Stanford University. ### Cloth Backdrop [![CC0](http://i.creativecommons.org/p/zero/1.0/88x31.png)](http://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/)   To the extent possible under law, Adobe has waived all copyright and related or neighboring rights to this asset [the cloth backdrop].
